name: In-Visible Tower
description:
You have been trapped by an evil witch, who wants to steal your superpower, the ability to turn invisible and visible on and off rapidly! You find a key to escape from your cell, now all you have to do to escape is get past the guards... But the witch hired 2 types of guards, just to make sure you won’t escape, some that can see you if you are visible but not if you are invisible, and others that can see you if you are invisible but not if you are visible! Use your super power to get past the guards and get through all 3 levels of the tower, to escape! Good luck…

This game was made in 24 hours, 12 on 11/25/2020, and 12 on 11/26/2020 for RambaMamba’s 100 Subscriber Special Game Jam :D The Deadline for the jam was around 50 hours but I didn’t use up all the time, thus there might be bugs and such, so let me know if there are! All models, music, and art are made by crashie204 :))

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys To Move
  • Space To Pause
  • Scrollbar To Change Visibility
  • Use Mouse Up And Down After Clicking Scrollbar To Change Visiblity
  • Press 1 To Go In Right Side View (Default)
  • Press 2 To Go In Mid View
  • Press 3 To Go In Left Side View
